body:
Sorry, I skimmed that comment when I was revising this issue.

ButÂ [the proposal](https://github.com/golang/proposal/blob/master/design/2981-go-test-json.md) does cover this use case. Output and test logs are emitted as a stream JSON objects as the tests execute. That should be sufficient to implement any kind of UI layer on top of the JSON output. I'm happy to reopen this proposal if that's not the case.
